page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: At school we have playtimes, before school, at lO.3O and at 2.3O. At the first playtime everyone goes out but not the infants, they have their own playtime later. The playground has a netball court and at the side of it there is a hop-scotch and some circles. At the other side there are some squares and other shapes and lines that you can go on with your cars. At playtime we usually play run across. When you play run across you run from one end of the netball court to the other end. Sometimes we play netball and football. Sometimes we play with our power balls and sometimes we have conkers. In the Summer we can play on the grass and we play fighting and rolling about. We also play cat and mouse on the middle square. Playtimes are about l5 minutes but at dinner we have an hour to play.
